p:
We defined and computed a measure of the strength of the linkage between the Swiss epidemic and those in other countries whose sequences could be included in our analyses. This measure consisted of assigning weights to each region according to its frequency of appearance in clusters containing Swiss MSM sequences. We defined the measure as follows:
θ g
=
1 Γ
∑ i
ρ g i
γ i
where
​​ Γ ​​ =
∑ i
γ i
is the total number of Swiss MSM sequences,
i
indexes international clusters,
γ i
is the number of Swiss MSM sequences in cluster
i
,
g
indexes countries of origin other than Switzerland, and
ρ g i
is the fraction of sequences in the international cluster
i
with country of origin
g
.
